cause.description:
Too many people live in darkness....playing instruments that will only making them dumber...but hark! Bass Clarinetism has come! All ye who wish to join this religous cause of instrumentation only need to sign u-p
1. Love Bass Clarinet
2. Wan to own amazing bass clarinet
3. Know that bass clarinet in jazz makes it ten times better.
cause.mission: bring the joy of bass clarinets to the masses.
cause.name: Bass Clarinetism
